title: Textile, early 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: satin weave. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-73.
